mapper.select: SELECT po.purchase_order_id, po.purchase_order_code, v.vendor_name, po.warehouse_id, po.purchase_order_status, po.total_amount, po.created_at FROM purchase_order po JOIN vendor v ON po.vendor_id = v.vendor_id WHERE po.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
SELECT pod.product_id, p.product_name, pod.quantity, pod.unit_price FROM purchase_order_detail pod JOIN product p ON pod.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pod.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
